Translations.Text: Ninahaza izina ry’Umuremyi wawe mutagatifu
Uwaremye ibintu vyose nukubi ringaniza
Nukugerageza kimwe kukindi, nukukirongora
Niya nagishije ivyakatsi vyose
Hanyuma nukuyigira ivyumye n’ibara ryirabura
Tuzo kwigisha kandi ntuzo kwibagira
Mugabo Imana ibishatse niyo ifise ubumenyi bw’ibiboneka hamwe nibita boneka
Natwe tuzo kworohereza idini ryoroshe
Rero nubashikirize ubwo butumwa nibwaba bushoboka
Ntankeka azokwibuka uwutinya Imana yiwe y’ukuri
Uwufise ibihano vyinshi azoba kure y’ubwo butumwa
Uwuzo kwinjira mu muriro udahera muniniya cane
Hanyuma muri uwo muriro udahera ntazopfa canke ntazoba muzima
Mu vy’ukuri aramaze kuronka intsinzi uwisukuye n’amabi
Akibuka izina ry’Umuremyi wiwe n’ugusenga
Mugabo mwebwe mukunda cane ubuzima bwo ngaha kw’Isi
Mugihe ubuzima bwo mw’ijuru aribwo bwiza gusumba kandi buramba
Mu vy’ukuri ibi vyose, biri mu bitabu vy’akahise. hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana
Ibitabu vy’intumwa y’Imana Ibrahimu (iii) hamwe n’intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii)
Mbega warashikiwe n’inkuru y’ivyago bizopfuka ibiremwa vyose
Uwo musi amaso y’abantu azoba afise ibimaramare vyinshi cane
N’ukugira imirimo ikoma komeye cane iruhisha
Binjire mu muriro udahera waka cane
Bazonyweshwa muri ayo mariba abira ukuri kwama
Ntabifungurwa bazoba bafise atari ibifungurwa vy’amahwa gusa
Ntibivyibuhisha canke ngo bikure ikigoyi
Amaso y’abandi bantu kuri uwo musi w’imperuka azoba asayangana neza
Azoba yashimiwe kubera ibikorwa vyabo bagize
Zizoba ziri mw’ijuru ry’iteka ntangere
Ntizizo kwumva muri ayo majuru ibidafise akamaro
Harimwo amariba y’amazi ashunguruka neza
Harimwo n’inyegamo z’iteka zitaramuwe hejuru
N’ibirahuri bishinguwe neza
N’imisego itondeshejwe kumirongo n’iyindi
N’ibirago bishashwe neza biteye igomwe
Mbega ntibitegereza igene Ingamiya yaremwe
N’Amajuru ingene yareruwe
N’Imisozi igene yatsimbatajwe
N’Isi igene twayaguye
Rero niwibutse mu vy’ukuri wewe n’uwibutsa abantu gusa
Wewe suwo kubaca imvutu
Mugabo uwusubiye inyuma n’uguhakana Umuremyi wiwe w’ukuri
Imana izo muhana ibihano bininiya cane
Mu vy’ukuri ingaruka yabo niyizoba iwacu
Hanyuma ntankeka iharurwa ryabo riri hejuru yacu
Ndarahiye k’Umutwenzi
No kumisi icumi
No ku bintu bibiri bibiri, canke kuri kimwe kimwe
No kw’Ijiro rirenganye
Hari muri ibi, indahiro k’uwufise ubwenge agatinya
Mbega ntiwabonye ingene Umuremyi wawe yagiriye bene Aadi
Abo bene Irama bari bafise amazu mare mare
Abo bantu bataremwe nk’abandi bantu mubindi bisagara
Na Thamuda aribo babaje imisozi kumbuga zabo
Na Fir’auni nyene amazu nk’inkingi zikiriho n’ubu
Abagize amabi mubisagara
Hanyuma bararengeje urugero muri ivyo bisagara kumabi atako avurwa
Kuri ivyo Umuremyi wawe yarabakubise inkoni imwe gusa y’ibihano
Mu vy’ukuri Umuremyi wawe ari mw’iperereza
Mugabo umuntu Umuremyi wiwe yamuhaye ibibazo n’ukumuha iteka n’ukumuha imigisha nawe agaca avuga ati:- Muremyi wanje wampaye iteka ntangere
Nigihe imuhaye ibibazo nukumu gabaniriza imigisha yiwe, aca avuga ati:- Muremyi wanje uramaramaje
Suko, ahubwo mwebwe ntimuraba impfuvyi n’ijsho ry’ikigongwe
Kandi mwebwe ntimwihimiriza kurisha abakene
Kandi murarya ibisigi vy’abantu n’igihababu cinshi cane
Kandi murakunda amatungo k’urugero rurengeje ibintu vyose
Suko bimeze, mugihe Isi izo manyagurwa ibimanyu manyu
N’Umuremyi wanyu azoshika ari kumwe n’Abamarayika bari kumirongo n’iyindi
Rero kuri uwo musi hazo shikirizwa wa muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, kuri uwo musi umuntu azokwibuka, mugabo uko kwibuka kwiwe kuzo mumarira iki
Azovuga ati:- iyo ntanguza ineza kubera ubuzima bwanje
Rero uwo musi Imana ntizohana umuntu uwariwe wese nkuko Imana ihora ihana
Kandi ntizo boha uwariwe wese nkuko ihora ibaboha
Ewe mutima uhumuye
N’ugaruke ku Muremyi wawe	wizeye yuko utekaniwe, n’Imana	nayo itekanirwe na wewe
Rero niwinjire mumirwi y’abantu beranda
Winjire mw’Ijuru ryanje
